Package bayes

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BayesianNetwork
    Objects of this class encapsulate a complete Bayesian Network.
    BNConditionalQuery
    Used for querying a BayesianNetwork object for a conditional probability of the value of a single attribute conditioned on the values of a set of other attributes.
    BNDataGenerator
    Used for generating a data set from a learned Bayesian Network.
    BNEvaluator  
    BNJointQuery
    Used for querying a BayesianNetwork object for a joint probability of a set of attribute/value pairs.
    BNNode
    A single node in a BayesianNetwork object
    BNNodeManager
    Manages the nodes and all node and edge operations in a Bayesian network such as adding/removing nodes and edges and updating the parameters in the model.
    BNResultWriter  
    BNUtility
    A utility class for miscellaneous methods needed for Bayesian network learning.
    VariableSet
    This class represents represents a set of attribute/value pairs.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BayesianNetwork.Type
    Network structure inference algorithms
